sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Bring vegetable stock to a boil in a pot. 2. Add lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, minced garlic, and sliced bird's eye chili. Simmer for 5 minutes. 3. Stir in coconut milk and bring to a simmer. 4. Add peeled and deveined shrimp and cook until pink. 5. Season with lime juice, fish sauce, and brown sugar. 6. Garnish with chopped cilantro and green onion. 7. Serve hot.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Shrimp (300g, peeled and deveined), Coco</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Coconut Shrimp Soup</name> <nutrition>Calories: 300, Protein: 20g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 25g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Peel and devein shrimp. 2. Bruise and chop lemongrass. 3. Slice galangal.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b891d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afe7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
